title: META Prize and META Seal of Recognition Award Ceremony

author: Bernardo Magnini, Fondazione Bruno Kessler
recorded by: German Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (DFKI)

segmentation: So thank you very much for this recognition.
We ask of Marcelo Federico with together with me.
Coordinator of the Human Language Technology Group at FBC and also be on behalf of all the people who have been working on this tool kit.

Let's say 2 words, so if still Emma stands for two years toolkit for language modeling is a toolkit to develop the at FBC for the estimation, representation and computational statistical language modeling.
You can find information of this on this toolkit are at.
Address the web address.

There are a number of features for this toolkit which include advanced smoothing methodology is for larger language modeling, approximate smoothing for gigantic language modeling, a pruning and quantization efficiently, storing on disk and memory.
This tool allows the adaptation for several.
Language modeling methods.
It is compatible with the language models which have been created by other tools.

What is very important is that it has been integrated in several applications, including Moses, the platform for machine translation and including the automatic Speech Recognition System developed at FBC.
The lemma is distributed under an open source.
Software distribution with the L GPL license.
It is a SourceForge project.
Few words about the history of this piece of software.
So basically we started 20 years ago, 1992.
There are exact time we had a very simple kind of application for and the main goal was the internal.
Internal user of the system we have been using for Easter Lamb for common controls are of a robot which were developed that we're beginning of arrogant activity.
It has been used in a dictation application for dictation of medical reports and one application for spoken data entry.
Then started from 2004 E Alema as being distributed under an open source framework are and in this case we started the integration of the package.
In a in different applications, including broadcast news, transcription and news translations.
As you can see from this line, even the amount of data which we were able to manage are as increased a lot during the years.
Now we are able.
To manage task proposed by NIST on machine translation and recently here's the lemma has been applied to the translation of TID talks.
As I mentioned that you still Emma is distributed as another source of package during the time we had the more than 10,000 downloads, which include both company and research institutions.
Here we have a list of some of the companies who are who are using Easter Lamb, which include.
Tech translated under Voice as we mentioned before.
It is also used by several public institutions including JRC and the European Community.
This is just to conclude and to give credit to the people who actually have been working on Instagram.
Thank you very much.
Thank you very much.
